title: Alleged Mass. YMCA voyeur facing 21 new charges
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime The Brockton man previously pled guilty to similar charges and remains incarcerated.
The East Bridgewater Police Department is filing 21 additional charges against a Brockton man accused of photographing women and children in the shower at the local YMCA.
Abidan Rivera, 43, pleaded guilty in May to taking photos of a woman in a YMCA shower and is incarcerated at the Plymouth County Correctional Facility.

title: 13 arrested, 4 police officers injured at pro-Palestinian protest in Boston
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News Officials say the demonstration turned violent after protesters refused to clear the roadway and surrounded police cruisers.
By Abby Patkin updated on October 8, 2025 | 11:39 AM 4 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

Thirteen people were arrested in downtown Boston Tuesday night after a pro-Palestinian demonstration turned violent — a chaotic scene that also left four Boston police officers injured, according to officials.
